name: FnF Rulay
description:
FnF Rulay is a cross-over with La Ganga, a new Latin Trap music group.

This project is more of a promo game than a mod. I built it from scratch using Unity so don't expect it to play as good as the original fnf  :/     (og fnf is a master piece!!!)

(Theres only 1 playable song here (Rulay) and its 3.2 minutes long)

This game was supposed to release on mobile platforms only.... but yeah things didn't go so well and we wanted to give iOS users a backdoor to play this. SO NOW ITS ON PC BROWSERS!!! HOORAY!!

The game is buggy on the browser so if ya have an android go get it on google play!!  This was a fun project to work on. Hope ya'll stick around till the end and watch those credits roll / play that secrete game mode, I'd appreciate it!

Also for anyone who likes FREE stuff check the link below, I've made the art assets I created for this project free to download. Use it however you want!

Thanks for reading! (if ya did... if not its cool. *T-T*) happy gaming!

[CONTROLS]

Enter - Menu/Confirm
Arrow Keys - Controls Arrows
RMB - For menu clicks
*Touch Screen compatible*

[KNOWN BUGS]
- Audio resets when game is paused (restart the scene in pause menu to fix)
- Having to press enter twice during the performance mode unlocked prompts
[FREEBIES]

Download the hi res project files!
